1.content: So which series you want to work with?
1.title: Intro

11.content: What type of anime and/or manga are we going to cover in this storyline?
11.title: Anime/Manga

111.content: The female character from Dragon Ball who we are going to focus is...
111.title: Dragon Ball

choices: it detached her head from her body
it made her body from the neck down vanish
it made a duplicate of her head
1111.content:
The intelligent, wealthy, and beautiful blue-haired Bulma Briefs is in her laboratory, creating a new invention. "Almost finished," she says to herself as she screws a bolt into the machine, "and... there! Complete!" Bulma gets up and wipes her brow, smiling at yet another completed invention: a remote control-looking gizmo. "Now to test it on the prettiest woman in the universe, i.e. me." Bulma aims the remote at herself and presses a button on it. ZAP!

What did the remote do to Bulma Briefs?
1111.title: Bulma

11112.content:
The remote causes a flash that engulfs the entire lab, and when it dies, Bulma sees the results. "Wow, everything is so high," she says. She tries to move, but cannot. "What, am I paralyzed?" She then realizes what had happened when she saw her reflection in the mirror. "Wow, I'm just a head! That remote vanished my entire body from the neck down!" She then sighs. "I knew I should've tested it with someone else in the room." She then calls, "Hello? Anyone?"

Suddenly Bulma hears feet walking into the lab. Yes! she thinks. The person who is walking into the room is...
11112.title: it made her body from the neck down vanish

choices: uses the remote on Bulma, fixing her
instead takes Bulma's head to their room
111121.content:
Bulma spots a familiar pair of size 9 boots walking into her laboratory. "Vegeta, over here!" she calls.

True enough, Vegeta is shocked to see his Earthling wife's still-alive disembodied head on the floor. "What the hell?" he says, hurriedly running to Bulma's head and picking her up. "Oh God, did Krillin use his Kienzan on you?"

"No, Krillin wasn't even here," Bulma explains. "I actually did this to myself."

"How?"

"Well, do you see that remote on the drawer?"

"Yes."

"I tested it on myself, and now my entire body from the neck down has vanished."

Vegeta is amazed as he turns Bulma's head upside down. "No blood."

"Yes. Now could you be a kind husband and zap me with that remote again? I really could use my body back."

Vegeta...
111121.title: her husband Vegeta

1111212.content:
Vegeta brings Bulma's head up to eye level, telling her, "You know, you are one attractive head."

"Yes, Vegeta, I know that," Bulma says. "Now could you stop playing around and..."

"I mean, I've smashed skulls less precious than yours," Vegeta interrupts.

"Yeah, yeah, use your Saiyan charm. Now could you help me?"

"Oh, I can help, alright," the Saiyan prince says, smiling cheekily.

"Oh, crap. You have that face."

"You know me so well, Bulma." Vegeta then leaves the room, carrying Bulma's head with him.

"Vegeta! Go back and grab the remote to turn me back to normal!"

"Not after I rock your head... like a hurricane."

Bulma just sighs, muttering, "Baka..."

NOTE: This chapter was written in honor of the late Hiromi Tsuru (1960-2017), who was Bulma's original Japanese voice actress. RIP
1111212.title: instead takes Bulma's head to their room

1113.content: Here are some other DB gals...
1113.title: other Dragon Ball females

choices: floating where she was earlier.  She blasted her head off!
raining down in a million pieces.  She blew her whole body up!
11132.content:
Floating hundreds of feet above a smoldering valley that had once been a mountain a blond haired and blue eyed cyborg (not android... technically) frowned. "Nope, not even close. C'mon 18, you can do better than that!" She said aloud, concentrating on her internal battery and trying to reroute more energy into her palms to deliver a more devastating attack. While at one point 18 was one of the most powerful beings on earth in recent years she'd nearly fallen completely out of the runnings. Not due to her own lack of power but simply due to the exponentially scaling threats and new super forms and interdimensional beings popping out of the woodworks. Not to mention being a mother took a lot of her spare time. Now however she had a day to herself and was trying to find new and improved techniques that would make her competitive again.

Shutting off her energy inhibitors, heat safeties, and routing full power to her hands amid a blare of warning messages and alerts filling up her optics 18 pointed her hands towards the valley. "Alright, let's try... this!" For a few moments a crackling sphere of crimson energy formed before her fingertips, violent arcs of red electricity crackling along its surface. It grew to twice 18's height in a few seconds, a slow rumbling hiss emanating from the sphere as it expanded. "Now we're talking!" She said.
Without warning the surface of the orb cracked like glass, a spiderweb of black lines spreading over the surface with blood tinted light pouring out of the cracks as the energy destabilized. "Oh, that can't be go-"

It wasn't. In an instant the ball exploded right in front of 18's face, heat and wind and smoke and lighting shooting past her skin as she tumbled out of the air. With a clang she collided with the earth, her thoughts jumbled and her diagnostics going crazy. "Ugh, maybe those safties were there for a reason." She grumbled. "Alright, lesson learned. Don't turn those off. Now then, let's try-" She tried to fly but found herself unable to move. No matter how hard she focused she remained lying on the groubd facing up towards the sky. "Crap, don't tell me that I shorted my flight circuits! Ugh, walking home is gonna be a-" She stopped. Not only could she not fly, but she couldn't move either. Panicing 18 scanned her damage report and let out a shocked gasp. "I'm... I'm just a head!" She said, looking down for the first time and seeing her chin was resting flat against a rock, her body clearly not below her. Looking back up she scanned the sky intently and soon enough she saw her body...
11132.title: Android 18

choices: and she could still control it
but her body was now on auto-pilot
but her body would not move at all
111321.content: 18 saw her body still floating in the sky, headless. She sighed, being thankful that she was part robot; otherwise, she would be dead, which would prompt a journey to gather the Dragon Balls to revive her. She attempted to have her body fly down to retrieve her head...
111321.title: floating where she was earlier.  She blasted he...

1113211.content: 18 had her body fly down to the ground. She picked up her head and stared at her pale neck, which was full of electronic wires. "Again, I should probably thank the late Dr. Gero for robotizing me," she said to herself as she rubbed her neck. "I have a feeling that my head won't attach." To test her theory, 18 tried to re-attach her head to her neck...
1113211.title: and she could still control it

choices: she finds it, and tucks it under her arm.
she accidentally knocks it down into the crater!
she loses track of where her body is and can't retrace her steps!
11132112.content:
Holding her head over her neck with one hand she feels around between the two stumps with her free hand. She takes hold of one of the thicker wires jutting from her body's neck, blindly feeling around the underside of her head for where it may connect. Even if she could see what she was doing down there she knew deep down that it wouldn't help. She had no idea what she was doing in her self operation. Dr Gero was the scientist, she was just the murder weapon. The back of her hand brushes against another piece of wire hanging below her head, its end frayed and its thickness about the same as the one she was holding. "Maybe that's where that goes?... I think?..." She tries to tie the wires together.

"Ah!" Android 18 blurts, static ringing in her ears and her vision distorting wildly as sparks shoot from her neck. Dropping her head her body falls backwards, rubbing its severed wires and shattered pistons sorely. "Yeah. No. I have no idea what I'm doing. Great." She says with a sour tone. She scans the area around her, seeing only the edge of a large crater in the ground where once there was a mountain. "Oh, and I landed facing the wrong direction. Great. No, this day is just going great." Getting her body onto her hands and knees Android 18 begins patting around in the rocks in search of her severed head. Eventually...
11132112.title: but it would not attach

choices: but first, she went to her own place, Kame House
only to be interrupted by Vegeta, who desperately wanted a rematch against her
111321121.content: Luckily, Android 18 found her head again and simply just tucked it under her arm. "Maybe I should visit Capsule Corp," she said to herself. "I'm sure Bulma could repair me instantly." She held onto her head and flew off towards Bulma's house...
111321121.title: she finds it, and tucks it under her arm.

1113211212.content: Before going to Capsule Corp., 18 decided to visit her house first to make sure that her family knew what happened to her. After landing on the island, she turned her head to her body and sighed before turning it towards Kame House and walking to it. She grabbed a pair of keys from her pocket and unlocked the door. She was instantly spotted by...
1113211212.title: but first, she went to her own place, Kame House

choices: "No, I'm going to fight you now, head or no head."
1113211213.content:
While flying, Android 18 heard a familiar voice call her number: "EIGHTEEN!"

She simply turned around, sighing. "Oh, hello, Vegeta," she said.

"Wha-" Vegeta was shocked at the blonde cyborg carrying her head in her hands.

"It's a minor issue. I was going to go meet Bulma to fix this."

"Well, it looks like someone's doing their best Android 16 impression," Vegeta joked.

"Hey, maybe you crushing my head would cause Krillin to go Super Saiyan," 18 retorted. "Anyway, why are you here?"

"I was just flying around the area, when I was just reminded of the time you broke this!" Vegeta said, pointing at his arm.

"Oh, get over it! That was a long time ago, and you're much stronger than I am now."

"That is true, but I still haven't beaten you in battle! I want a rematch!"

"Really. You actually waited until part of my body fell off to fight me again."

"Well, I didn't expect you to be in this condition, so carry on. I'll wait until Bulma reattaches your head."

Android 18 responded,
1113211213.title: only to be interrupted by Vegeta, who desperate...

121.content: Which Mario girl will this happen to? In the end, it will spread to the others.
121.title: Mario

choices: but her body seems to have a mind of its own
1212.content:
Princess Daisy is in her castle located in Sarasaland, slightly annoyed that nothing exciting has ever happened around her kingdom ever since Tatanga kidnapped her back in Super Mario Land. "Oh, what to do, what to do," she says to herself. "I mean, I could participate in sports or a party or kart racing with my friends, but they're all in the Mushroom Kingdom." She sighs as she holds the hair on her head. "It's so dull around here that I wish I could just take off my head!"

Suddenly Daisy's wish is granted as her head begins detaching from her body, floating above her neck.

"Yikes, what's going on?" she cries as her head flies around her room and lands on her bed. She looks back at her headless body and tries to control it...
1212.title: Daisy

choices: It stays on and she can take it off
12121.content:
Daisy imagine herself moving her right arm and her body surprisingly did. Daisy thought of herself jumping a bit, and her body did just as she imagined. The little head might need to get used to a bodiless life, but at least she can control her body again. It's as if she can feel her body again, despite not being attached to it.

"Come on girl, come back to mama." said Daisy as she instructs her body to pick her up.

The body slowly approaches to her head on the bed. Daisy is still getting used to controlling her body like this as her body bumps into some of the furniture. Eventually the body got her head and picks her up, sadly upside down.

"Body!" said Daisy.

The body then held Daisy upright and tucked her head under her arm.

"Much better. This might take some time getting used to, but I got to make sure if I can get back onto my body." said Daisy, "Being headless is kind of fun an all, but too much might be a bother."

So Daisy said to her body, "Okay body, put me back on."

Daisy felt herself being lifted and placed on her neck stump. When she lets go of her head...
12121.title: and she still can surprisingly!

121211.content: Daisy's head attaches to her body perfectly. "Huh," she says to herself. She then pulls off her head again. "My head can come on and off easily." She decides to use this ability to...
121211.title: It stays on and she can take it off

1212111.content:
"Oh boy, Peach is going to be shocked when she sees this!" Daisy says as she leaves her castle in Sarasaland and walks towards the Mushroom Kingdom. As she walks to Peach's castle, she knocks on the door. Out comes one of Peach's servant Toads.

"Oh, hi, Daisy!" the Toad says, happy to see a familiar face. "Looking for Peach?"

"Yerp," Daisy quickly answers.

Toad says,
1212111.title: Showing Peach

choices: waits until Peach returns to the castle
decides to search for Peach herself
goes to the Marios' house to see if Luigi is home
12121112.content:
"Let me guess, Bowser kidnapped her again?" Daisy asks.

"Correct," Toad answers.

The tomboy princess sighs. "Every Wednesday, this happens."

"Do not worry. Mario is on his way to rescue her!"

Daisy...
12121112.title: "Our princess is in another castle!"

choices: carries her head as she walks to another room
puts her head down and explores the castle headless
puts her head in a box and delivers her to someone
12122.content:
"Hey, I can't move my body!" Daisy says. Suddenly her headless body walks around her room all by itself, touching the stump of its neck every now and then. "This got so much weirder."

Eventually the body walks towards its head and picks it up, "staring" at it.

Daisy looks confused at her sentient body. "Um, body, do you have any idea how this happened?"

Daisy's body shrugs her shoulders.

"I thought as much."

Daisy's body then...
12122.title: but her body seems to have a mind of its own

121222.content:
Daisy finds herself back on the bed, this time on a pillow and her hair off her face. She looked at her body, wondering what she will do next. Since Daisy is only a head, she is practically vulnerable. The head only hoped that nothing goes wrong.

"So uh, what now?" asked Daisy, "How about putting me back on?"

The body glares at her head and left. The body looks bored and does not want to carry her heavy head. The body decides to walk away from her head as a result. Daisy's head then starts begging for her body to come back.

"Body, please! I'll do anything to be attached to you again! I'll eat healthier food! Hurting myself less! Maybe sometime without me off! At least keep me beside you!" begged Daisy.

It was too late. The body has left the room with the door shut. Daisy is now only a head on a pillow. She thought to herself on how things got so wrong. And we continue the story with...
121222.title: puts her head down and explores the castle head...

121223.content:
"Wait, body. What are you doing?" asked Daisy.

Daisy's head was carried by her body to what seems to be a box. Daisy was slowly put in there by her body as Daisy freaks out at the slow suspense of whatever her body is going to do to her. Sadly, Daisy is only a head and she can't do much in her current state.

"Body, let's talk this out. I'll be a good head, just don't put me in the box." begged Daisy.

The body was deaf to her head as Daisy is now in the box and saw her body closed it. All the head got now was some light as Daisy felt the box being lifted off and sent somewhere. Daisy spent most of the time screaming for help, but no one seemed to listen. Or at least she think that as she has no idea what is going on outside of the box.

Eventually Daisy's box was given to someone and it opens up, revealing...
121223.title: puts her head in a box and delivers her to someone

choices: Peach can also take her head off
1212231.content:
The box opens as Daisy saw the face of Princess Peach. The head shouted, "Peach! I'm so glad to see you!"

"Daisy? Is that really you?" asked Peach.

"The one and only." answered Daisy, "To sum it all up, I was bored and my head popped off. Then my body thought it was a good idea to ship me off to here."

"That's horrible. I'll let you stay with me for a while since I think your body need some alone time." said Peach.

"Thanks for the offer and not making fun of me." said Daisy.

"That's what friends are for." said Peach.

Peach then carries Daisy's head to her room as they pasted the hall of Toad guards. The Toads felt uneasy or interested in the bodiless Daisy as the head felt either anxious or not caring at all. When they do reached to the room, Daisy's head was placed on a pink pillow in a table to get herself comfy.

"Pink is not my favorite color, but it will do." said Daisy.

"For one thing, I don't know what you can do now in your state other than me taking care of you." said Peach.

"Now I'm nothing more than an object to you." said Daisy.

"To be fair, your more precious than that." said Peach.

"That's assuring." said Daisy.

"Wait one moment. I have to do something quick." said Peach.

And it turns out that...
1212231.title: Peach

choices: Daisy learning to bond with a body with Peach's body
Daisy learns about feeding a body
12122311.content:
Peach grabbed both sides of her head and pops it out. Peach is now only a head carried by her body. Despite Daisy's current state, she was surprised to see this.

"Oh, I kind of kept this a secret from others because I was afraid of how the others feel. I'm glad I can show this to someone." said Peach's head.

"You can take off your head too?" asked Daisy.

"To be frank, most princesses and some girls have the ability in this universe, including you and Rosalina. I was afraid to ask because you or the other princesses might freak out." said Peach.

"And your body, she's not ditching you or anything." said Daisy.

"To be frank, me and my body got along the first time I was detached. I have been like this for a while." said Peach as her body pets and brushes her hair.

"I'm kind of jealous that you two even have that type of relationship." said Daisy.

"It will take a while, but you and your body will get along soon." assured Peach, "For now, your stay with me will teach you about being a head and how to interact with your body."

"Wait, I need to know how to be a head?" asked Daisy.

"It just helps you make the most of being a disembodied head and how you can treat your body right." said Peach.

"Okay. I'm ready for lesson 1." said Daisy.

"Good." said Peach.

Lesson one is...
12122311.title: Peach can also take her head off

124.content:
Vocaloids are programs that can sing from your text and have been gaining some popularity. And they even have a rhythm based game made by Sega. Our story begins with Hatsune Miku, the most popular one, as she is the first to become bodiless and sadly spread this mess to her friends. Since things are random with the character and there is no clear story, you can go crazy if you like.

Though how does this happen?
124.title: Vocaloids(Personal taste and technically)

1243.content: There can be more causes of Miku losing her head.
1243.title: More

12433.content: What are the other reasons? Was she made this way as the head is built for singing while the body is for dancing? Or perhaps she was experimented on?
12433.title: More

choices: Miku's body place her head on a table
Miku's head can float on her own
124331.content:
Miku just finished singing her latest song as she headed to home to rest for the day. She got on her default outfit as she enters her home and then pops off her head. Turns out she can always do that as her head and body are two different beings. The head is made for singing while the body is made for dancing. It helps make the programing slightly more easier. The only thing keeping the head and body connected is magnetism. So far, she is the latest Miku model to have this function while the original is just a hologram along with the other vocaloid. You could say that she's the first robotic one and she will eventually have more friends.

Miku carried her head around her home as the head and body treat each other as two different people. Miku looks up as she told her body, "Man, today was rough. Great job out there body with your moves."

The body gave a thumbs up.

"I sometimes wish I can dance on my own instead of making you do all the work. You deserve more appreciation, but I'm just head." said Miku.

The body got out Miku's phone and text, "You are my only source of fuel, sight, hearing, and beauty. You can be beautiful without me."

"Aw, thanks body." said Miku.

And so...
124331.title: Built this way

choices: Presents only Rin Kagamine, full bodied and same functions as Miku
Presents only Rin's head, Miku and Rin has to share bodies
1243311.content:
Miku was used to this as it was a daily routine. Her body would need to stretch her neck for having her head on the whole time and spend the rest of the day headless. Miku's head is slightly heavier than a human head as it is mostly machine. While waiting for her body to carry her again, Miku sang a silent tune to practice her artificial vocals.

Miku then has her head tucked on her arm and tries to think of things to do. She could watch TV or go on the internet. Maybe she can interact with the staff because they are the only people she can talk to. And then someone knocks the door.

Miku guessed that it is a special delivery of another vocaloid like her being made. She walked to the door and opened it to reveal a scientist like man. From what Miku guess is that the man is here to deliver her Rin Kagamine as she was planned as the next model to be made. As it turns out, the scientist guy...
1243311.title: Miku's body place her head on a table

12433111.content:
"Hi Miku, I'm Rin. I'm the new vocaloid made with the same technology as you. I usually have my twin brother Len, but the scientist only want to build females as of late." said Rin.

Miku still as a head said, "Well welcome to the world little one."

Rin takes off her head to match her superior of sorts, "Thank you. I hope we get along."

The scientist man says, "I'm glad we had a good start. I'm also glad that Rin is working. And Miku, you better because as this girl can be a bit hyper active."

Rin giggles as her head is tucked under her arm. The scientist leaves and closed the door as Rin enters her new home.

"So big sister, what do you want to do now?" asked Rin.

"Well... we can just watch TV." said Miku.

"Boring. We can take off our heads. Totally not like the original Miku and Rin. We can do so much with this." said Rin.

"I don't know." said Miku.

"Please big sister." said Rin.

Miku decides...
12433111.title: Presents only Rin Kagamine, full bodied and sam...

12433112.content:
"Hi Miku, I'm Rin. I'm the new vocaloid made with the same technology as you. I usually have my twin brother Len, but the scientist only want to build females as of late." said Rin, "I may be only a head, but I was made to share bodies with you."

"But our bodies won't match." said Miku who still has her head tucked under her arm.

The scientist man said, "Don't worry. Your body is made to alter itself to change it's appearance based on it's head. It even can change clothes instantly as you seen lately."

Miku's body does have the ability to change clothes easily and her head can give herself a makeover like that too. Miku then used her free arm to tuck Rin's head under it.

"I hope we get along big sister." said Rin.

"Me too." said Miku.

"If anything goes wrong, please notify me. Bye." said the scientist man.

...

Later, Miku and Rin's head were on a table as the body has no choice but to put one on. Carrying two heads is a bit too heavy. Especially when these robotic heads are heavier than a human head.

"I never had a body before." said Rin.

"This may be your chance, unless my body wants me." said Miku.

"Man, I hope it chooses me." said Rin.

"I'm fine as a head so I hope that my body is willing to put you on." said Miku.

And so Miku's body decides to attached...
12433112.title: Presents only Rin's head, Miku and Rin has ...

choices: Miku to use her as a ball
124331122.content:
"Aw." whines Rin's head.

"Sorry Rin. We heads must respect our body's choice. After all, she is the one who carry us around." said Miku's head as she was attached to her body.

"Boo." said Rin as she puffed her cheeks.

Miku picks up her little roommate's head and said, "Cheer up little one, you are going to have a turn with this body no matter what. Maybe today I'll convince this body to put you one. She's probably just too shy to do so."

"Fine, but can you do me a favor?" asked Rin.

"Might as well." agreed Miku.

Rin wants...
124331122.title: Miku's head

1243311222.content:
"I can't risk damaging you." worried Miku.

"Don't worry. They tested my head that way to make sure I don't break easily. Remember when they did it with you big sister?" said Rin's head.

"I never liked it." said Miku.

"I do. How about we keep it simple with some bowling? Or golf? I'm bouncy enough to be a basketball." begged Rin.

"Fine, but I must be light with you and safety comes first." said Miku.

"Thanks big sister." said Rin.

So Miku build used some stuff in her room to play...
1243311222.title: Miku to use her as a ball

choices: Talk more as the body prepares for bed
12433112221.content:
"Are you really really sure?" asked Miku.

"Positive." replied Rin's head.

Miku had just set up some random things that can serve as bowling pins. She prepares to roll her little friend as she then threw Rin's head. Rin rolled on the floor with ease as her head is more round than Miku. The head giggled as she gave Miku a strike.

"Are you okay?" said Miku.

"I'm fine. That was fun!" screamed Rin's head.

Miku took off her own head and said, "Maybe I can join?"

"The more the merrier!" cried Rin's head.

So the two kept bowling with their heads. Miku sort of had trouble due to her twin tails so she tied them up to roll better. Rin would sometimes get attached to the body as it changes to look like the real Rin Kagamine's body. While attached, she will attempt to roll Miku, but fails at hitting the makeshift pins.

"Better luck next time." said Miku's head.

"No fair, your not a good ball big sister!" said Rin.

"Sorry, but your not a good player too." said Miku's head.

"I prefer being the ball then, though it was fun either way." said Rin.

Miku's head smiled at her as Rin smiled back. So after all of that, the two remained as heads for the night as they...
12433112221.title: Bowling

124333.content: Should we add more vocaloid girls or just keep going with Miku?
124333.title: More

12433312.title: I prefer Luka

124333122.content: How about that other vocaloid Meiko, will she work?
124333122.title: Not really

1243332.content: What if Miku has a robotic pet that is a copy of her head? Technically a pet head of herself. The head would act and look like Miku while the real Miku takes care of her. Yes or no.
1243332.title: Keep going with Miku

12433322.content: What if Miku is a robotic pet head being sold in stores? Probably get the other girls involved, but for now it's her.
12433322.title: No

12511.content:
(This is going to be a romanced Tali, just so it's easier for her to be without her suit on)

She currently didn't know where he was, but was just spending time with her skin touching the air. She wore a shirt of his that was long and baggy on her, and then her own panties. 12532212.content:
---
ERROR. CRYOSTASIS POD 6 HEAT DISTRIBUTION SYSTEM CRITICAL. UNEVEN HEAT DISTRIBUTION.

ERROR. CRYOSTASIS POD 6 BIOTIC SUSTAINMENT SYSTEM CRITICAL. FAILURE TO MAINTAIN BIOLOGICAL FUNCTIONS IN HIGHLIGHTED SECTIONS.

CALCULATING SOLUTIONS... CALCULATIONS COMPLETE. ATTEMPTING TO REROUTE BIOLOGICAL FUNCTIONS AROUND FAILURE ZONES. PROBABILITY OF SUCCESS: 8.3%

REROUTE SUCCESSFUL. BIOLOGICAL FUNCTIONS MAINTAINED AROUND FAILURE ZONE.

---
The rescue team looked grimly over the lab's twenty cryostasis pods. While they hadn't been expecting any miracles, they'd all been hoping they'd be surprised. Instead, they'd been met with exactly what they expected. A crypt. 19 corpses lay partially thawed or frostbitten beyond recognition inside their tubes, the pods unable to keep their occupants alive for such a long stretch of time with such limited power supplies, no maintenance, and no recalibrations. Only one pod contained a living occupant, pod #6, and while the computer readout still listed her as living a laundry list of errors filled the screen. Whether or not she'd survive being taken OUT of the pod was questionable at best. "Thoughts?" The rescue team leader, a short dark skinned woman in her earlier forties, asked the medical officer sent with them.

The medical officer, a deceptively young looking Swiss woman by the name of Angela, studied the subject kept within the pod. "Moving the cryostasis unit out of here is out of the question. These older units weren't designed for transportation and losing power for even a moment... well, you can see what happens for yourself." She said, motioning towards the 19 pods lining the rest of the room. "That being said it's a miracle it's managed to last this long, and every second she spends in there at this point is another second that the machine could fail and... I don't think we have a choice. We have to open it."

The rescue team leader nodded, motioning towards the computer. Angela typed in a few commands and began the revival process, her eyes narrowing as the pod hissed and hummed. A few minutes passed, the ice slowly evaporating and color slowly returning to the pod's occupant. Most of her, anyway. The doctor noted that a thin line of icy blue flesh wrapped around the neck of Pod #6's occupant. Even as the thawing process entered its final stages the blue line remained, the doctor growing more and more concerned by the second.

Before Angela could say anything to her colleague the pod's door swiveled open, the process complete and the subject revived. "Ugh... where... who... wha?" The pod's occupant murmured, squinting as her senses returned. She shifted awkwardly, her completely bare flesh rubbing against the pod's cool metal interior as she struggled to regain control of her muscles.

"Take it easy, you've been out a while." Angela said, placing a hand on the woman's shoulder. "Do you remember your name?" She asked, ignoring the blue line for now. The pod's occupant seemed to be responsive in spite of the frostbite.

"Mei. Mei... Mei-Ling Zhou." She answered, struggling but succeeding in recalling her name.

"Nice to meet you Mei. My name is Dr Angela, though you're free to call me 'Mercy' I suppose." She said. Turning towards the rescue team leader Mercy asked "Can you hand me one of the blankets? I'm sure our friend would appreciate some coverage."

"Mercy... that... that's familiar." She said, her thoughts still swimming but bits and pieces cutting through the fog. Her concentration was broken as the woman standing beside Dr Angela held out a blanket for her. Mei smiled, she'd almost forgotten that everyone on her team had had to enter the pods naked. Then she remembered. "My team!" She shouted, leaping from the pod to see her old team, unaware that she was the only remaining member of it.

Before that shock could set in however another one did. As her foot hit the ground the shockwave traveled up her body, through her flesh, and up to her neck. The thin blue line that wrapped around her neck exploded, ice and frozen fragments of flesh spraying in all directions as her neck was broken off her shoulders. Mei screamed as her head toppled off her shoulders and slammed into the ground, her body losing balance and falling in the opposite direction.

Mercy was stunned. Not only did she just watch a woman get decapitated, but she heard a woman scream AFTER getting decapitated. A complete impossibility. Bending down she slowly wraps her finger's around Mei's head and turns it around. Just as she thought, Mei's head was still alive. Still in shock, Mei asks "What happened?"

Mercy turned her head around to face her headless body. "That, apparently." Mercy said. Mei was speechless. "Can you sill move?" She asks. While normally she'd consider the possibility of a severed head beig able to control its body completely absurd said head was currently alive and speaking so currently Dr Angela was willing to believe anything.

Mei attempts to move her body and...
12532212.title: Mei

12533332321.content:
NOTE: This is for characters based on the games. If you want a character from the anime (be it an original one or a variation of a pre-existing one, like the protagonists), go make a Pokemon branch under the "Anime" branch of this story and add it there.

First things first: Since there are so many gosh-diddly darn characters in a series that's been around this long, even ignoring the titular creatures themselves, one should add whichever character they want to (or wait for someone else to) write about instead of going by a set order. There's no need to create a hundred chapters going through different characters that won't get something written for them just so you can put one in for someone down the line like a Sun & Moon character.

As for the protagonists, since they don't really have written personalities in the games (Red and Blue aside, but they're not that important here), feel free to write whatever you want in terms of personality for them... If you choose to go with a protagonist, anyway. (Of course, this is fanfiction, so mangling personalities probably comes naturally...)

With all that said and done... what would your preferences be?

1341.content:
The spoiled redhead awoke on the cold, tiled floor. The last thing she recalled was encountering the monster at yet another mansion. Always prone to kidnapping and abduction, very little surprised her about that part of mysteries anymore. On routine, she would've gotten up...if only she could feel her arms to do so! Lying sideways, Daphne opened her eyes, all puzzled. However, it wasn't until she felt a breeze below her head that she had any cause for alarm.

"What the...Jeepers!" she exclaimed. Her entire body went missing! This felt too real to be a dream. Somehow, her pretty head got separated from the rest of her, leaving Daphne completely helpless. "Uhh...help anyone?"

She had no clue how she got to her current location or even how long she'd been stuck there. The only thing Daphne could think of doing was inch her head around in each direction, mostly by pushing herself on her jaw. Not the most pleasant idea, especially for her hair, but the options were limited.

Finally, she got excited. "Velma! Thank goodness, I was so worried about being stranded—" Immediately Daphne noticed the problem. Conversely, all of Velma was there except for her head!! The body laid in this position:
https://pre00.deviantart.net/c757/th/pre...

"Well this stinks," Daphne added. She pictured Velma in a similar predicament, yelling out a variant of her usual issue; "My head! I can't see without my head!"

After that laugh, Daphne wondered if she could communicate with Velma's body somehow. "Velma...can you hear me?"

The body stirred a little. She checked whether it understood her. "If you can hear me, raise your hand!"

Velma's body complied. Daphne pondered other commands to give it. "What happened?"

Hey friend's body made pushing gestures around where her head should've been, and then a falling motion. Whoever did this, Daphne deduced, wanted to make them both as helpless as possible. "So then...can my body communicate with others?"

Velma's body simulated nodding with her torso. "But then...why can't I seem to?"

The body made a 'no' gesture. Daphne figured she might have misunderstood how this whole head-body link works. "Weird stuff. Anyways, how about we get up and out of here?"

Velma's body responded positively towards that thought. It and Daphne finessed towards each other, one lacking vision and the other lacking mobility, until Velma's body finally picked her up.

This body was plenty unpleasant...and Daphne shuddered at the thought of Velma having hers. She made a beeline for the door, a feat made easier by Velma's admittedly more practical footwear.

Though she wasn't the brains of the gang, Daphne knew a clue when she saw one. She recognized footprints from her actual body and decided to retrace her steps. She followed it down a corridor when she came across a mirror on the wall. Daphne took the moment to observe her current predicament. Looking at this borrowed body, she noticed how natural her head meshed with its neck. You would never suspect anything off about her appearance if you had never met her before.

All the diva, Daphne couldn't help but check herself out. It wasn't the worst body she could've landed up with; and her name wouldn't be Daphne Blake if she couldn't give any girl a makeover. Daphne thought for a second about the most 'Velma' thing she could do.She straightened her legs, arched her back, put one hand behind her back and the other pointing a finger up. https://img00.deviantart.net/d411/i/2009...

She couldn't deny how silly and fun this little out-of-body experience was turning out. "Daphne Dinkley?" She also said. "Nice little ring to that name." And so Daphne continued getting used to her friend's body. It's not like she viewed Velma's body as inferior...but, the grass did seem greener right then. But she did have to move on, and at least address her missing friend...and oh yeah, body.

"You know, I shouldn't be shocked," Daphne said to herself. "I've been in so many haunted houses, that I should've recognized this cliche. Maybe this path will lead me to Velma." She walked through the path, which led to...

13411231.content: Daphne followed the passage to what looked to be some sort of laboratory. "So this is probably where Velma and I were beheaded," she said as she explored it. She eventually encountered...

"No. But I know about an instrument that can aid us in our search."
134112312.content:
Daphne finally spotted the severed head of a familiar glasses-wearing nerd girl, who was sleeping on top of an operating table. "Velma!" she called.

Velma woke up. "Daphne?" she said, noticing that her friend's head was on her orange shirt-wearing body.

"Thank goodness I found you!" Daphne picked up Velma's head and hugged her.

"I see that my body has located you as well. Luckily I have the blueprints of this household engraved in my mind."

"Wow, you could still control your body despite not being attached to it?"

"Yes, at least until a different head was affixed to it."

"So Velma, do you know where my body is?"

Velma answered,
134112312.title: Velma's head

1341123122.content:
"Shoot!" Daphne said, snapping Velma's fingers. "Now we're stuck like this for the time being!"

"Daphne, I know my body is not as glamorous as yours," Velma said.

"Sorry, I didn't mean to criticize your body, Velma. It's not bad at all. I just want to get the both of us back to normal."

"Apology accepted. I believe that our first obligation to achieve is to search the laboratory for any clues."

13411231221.content:
After spending several minutes searching through the lab, Daphne and Velma found absolutely nothing. "This room is pretty empty!" Daphne exclaimed.

"I believe that whoever did this to us has another secret room," Velma's head concluded. "Did you find a clue on your way here, Daphne?"

"As a matter of fact, Velma," Daphne said as she pulled out the piece of glass from her pocket, "I did! Recognize this?"

"Jinkies, I do! I recall being beheaded by that substance."

"Well, the least I can do," Daphne said as she non-fatally and painlessly cut through her neck, slicing her head off, "is give you your body back, while you carry my head."

Velma says,

134112312212.content:
"Wait, why?" Daphne raised an eyebrow. "I came all this way to give your body back to you, and now you don't want it?"

"I like seeing you pilot it," Velma answered. "You kinda look better with my body than I do."

"Aww, thanks," Daphne chuckled, reattaching her head to her friend's body. "My hidden talent is making anything look hot." She struck a pose with Velma's stocky body, winking. "But when we find my body, you're gonna have to take yours back.

"I was kinda wondering, Daph..." Velma began.

"No way I'm letting you have my body!" Daphne exclaimed. "I'm only piloting yours because you won't."

"But that's the thing, I'm more interested in using your body," she declared. "Plus we have the blade, so we can switch whenever we finally feel like doing so."

"But it's my body...I can't just let anyone wear it."

Velma groaned. "Whatever, we'll figure out who gets whose bodies as soon as we recover yours, okay? Now, let's keep looking." Daphne picks up her friend's head and they...
134112312212.title: "Actually, you keep my body for now."

only Daphne can control the body

134112312213.content:
"Velma, we will be conjoined if we do that," Daphne said.

"Exactly," Velma said. "But this way, we will not lose track of each other. Also, we will not have to carry either of our heads on the way, since heads weight about 10 pounds."

"Good points. OK, let's do it."

Daphne grabbed both her and Velma's heads and attached them to the shoulders of the former's body. The two attempted to control their shared body and realize that...
134112312213.title: "I have another idea: how about we attach b...

1341123122132.content:
"Aw, you gotta be kidding me!" Velma complained. Although she was back on her original body, she didn't have any control over it!

"Sorry Velma! I didn't mean to make you a passenger of your own bod..." Daphne said as she put a hand to Velma's cheek. Velma just rolled her yes.

"Okay Daphne, lead the way. Let's go and find your body so we can return to normal."
1341123122132.title: only Daphne can control the body

13411231222.content:
Daphne opened the closet in the laboratory, revealing a headless body. "Jinkies!" she and Velma said in unison, causing the two to look at each other.

"For the record, Daphne, I am the only one allowed to say 'Jinkies,'" Velma informed.

"Well, technically, I am you from the neck down, so I should say it as well," Daphne said.

"Point taken."

The two then focused on the body with no head. "It's not my body," Daphne said.

"Well, we could affix my head to it," Velma explained, "so that the both of us can cover more ground."

"Velma, I think that's a great idea, but are you sure that you want that body? I mean, we have no idea how to remove our heads afterwards."

"If you are content with my body, Daphne, then I can be content with this one."

Daphne accepted her friend's decision and connected her head to this new body. So what kind of body is Velma's head attached to?
13411231222.title: a headless body (not Daphne's)

choices: she had a hard time ignoring her erection
134112312221.content:
Velma got up, observing the masculine body that her head was now affixed to. "Jinkies!" Velma announced, blushing as she noticed something in the body's pants. "I have been studying the anatomy of the male body, but it sure is a new experience when possessing one."

"I'll bet," Daphne said, trying to understand her friend's male erection.

Velma sighed. "Well, I guess this will have to do until you and I find your body and fix this catastrophe." She continued feeling aroused. "Oh, my, this will take some time getting acclimated to."

"Try to ignore it," Daphne suggested.

"OK, OK." Velma closed her eyes, trying to forget about the elephant in her pants. Eventually...
134112312221.title: a male body

1341123122212.content: The girls continued their search for this body thief, scanning down every surface in the room for another clue. As Velma gets accustomed to her new male body, she starts noticing her old one more. Daphne led the search, trying to find any sign of hers, bending over every few minutes to check under a table or shelf. Velma watched from behind, in a combination of embarrassment and arousal. Although Daphne was exposing her friend's panties to the world, Velma was the only one around to see it. Velma felt her underwear tightening, and on instinct put her hand inside to try to push it down. Touching herself only made her blush more, unable to find a comfortable position for her cock, yet compelled to keep touching it. When Daphne turns around to face her friend, does Velma pull her hand out of her underwear?
1341123122212.title: she had a hard time ignoring her erection

choices: Does she find another of her old parts?
Or does something completely different happen next?
1341124.content:
Daphne continued to waddle around in this strange body, blade in hand. It was her way of getting back to normal, wasn't it? All she had to do was find her own body and her friend's head. Little did she know, the footprints of her old body led to nothing more than her old feet!

"You've gotta be kidding me!" She complained. "This mastermind really thought of everything." She looked down at her original, dainty feet and realized her body must be helpless... "Oh no, I might be in more pieces than I thought! I've gotta take my old feet with me somehow...". Under the circumstances, Daphne didn't have her usual purse. But since these were rightfully her parts, she sliced off Velma's feet for the time being and attached her own. The fabric didn't seem any torn between Velma's socks and her pantyhose, so it gave her slight comfort knowing she was free to experiment with the blade. Cradling Velma's feet, she ventured further into this mansion.
1341124.title: something else

info.description: The title says it all, have your favorite female characters in anything lose their heads. The only rule I have is don't over sexualize it and don't get males involved as this is about female heads. Sadly I might update some rules or change them.
